text: Jimmy Greenspoon (February 7, 1948 â€“ March 11, 2015) was an American keyboard player and composer. He was best known as a member of the band, Three Dog Night. In 2014, Greenspoon was diagnosed with metastatic melanoma, and was forced to stop touring with Three Dog Night. He died from cancer in Montgomery County, Maryland, on March 11, 2015. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from melanoma Category:American composers Category:Musicians from California
title: Jimmy Greenspoon
